categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Loyal? Prove It" was an Imperial recruitment poster. As indicated by the name, it specifically sought out recruitments for the Commission for the Preservation of the New Order. It depicted two Imperial officers, one female, the other male, as well as a yellow and red background with the words "Loyal? Prove It!" at the top and the words on the bottom reading "Join COMPNOR Today!" with the smaller print below that giving the full name for COMPNOR, all written in the High Galactic alphabet. It was featured within the Imperial Handbook: A Commander's Guide in the section giving a brief introduction to the New Order, stating that within the Imperial hierarchy, loyalty of subjects must always be challenged, and that passivity must never be allowed.
